name: Black Moon Chronicles
description: You are Wishmerill, a half-elf on a quest for power in a medieval world. Choose your side and lead your troops to victory!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 95/98/XP/Me/Vista/7/8 Processor: 200 MHz Memory: 32 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8.1-compatible graphics card with 2 MB DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 540 MB available space Sound Card: All DirectX-compatible cards
